001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.HttpKafkaPosterPipeline;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.KafkaPosterOutputAdapter;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka.Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterPipeline;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.IoMode;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig.DecodeMode;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig;
012import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
013import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.poster.FilePosterOutputAdapter;
014import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.poster.HttpPosterPipeline;
015import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.poster.Tn3270PosterPipeline;
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.EnumMap;
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.Map;
020import java.util.Objects;
021import java.util.Optional;
022import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
023import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
024import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
025import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
026import java.util.concurrent.Future;
027import org.slf4j.Logger;
028import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
029import org.slf4j.MDC;
030
031/**
032 * Coordinates protocol-specific poster pipelines that render reconstructed traffic for reporting.
033 * <p>Each configured protocol runs in its own task; not thread-safe for concurrent {@link #run(PosterConfig)}
034 * invocations.</p>
035 *
036 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
037 */
038public final class PosterUseCase {
039  private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(PosterUseCase.class);
040
041  private final Map<ProtocolId, PosterPipeline> pipelines;
042
043  /**
044   * Creates a poster use case with the default protocol pipelines.
045   */
046  public PosterUseCase() {
047    this(defaultPipelines());
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Creates a poster use case with custom pipelines.
052   *
053   * @param pipelines map of protocol identifiers to pipeline implementations
054   */
055  public PosterUseCase(Map<ProtocolId, PosterPipeline> pipelines) {
056    Objects.requireNonNull(pipelines, "pipelines");
057    this.pipelines = Map.copyOf(pipelines);
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Runs the configured poster pipelines.
062   *
063   * @param config poster configuration supplied by the CLI layer
064   * @throws Exception if any pipeline fails
065   */
066  public void run(PosterConfig config) throws Exception {
067    Objects.requireNonNull(config, "config");
068    List<Callable<Void>> tasks = new ArrayList<>();
069
070    addTask(tasks, ProtocolId.HTTP, config.http(), config);
071    addTask(tasks, ProtocolId.TN3270, config.tn3270(), config);
072
073    if (tasks.isEmpty()) {
074      throw new IllegalArgumentException("poster: no protocol inputs configured");
075    }
076
077    if (tasks.size() == 1) {
078      tasks.get(0).call();
079      return;
080    }
081
082    ExecutorService executor = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(tasks.size());
083    try {
084      List<Future<Void>> futures = executor.invokeAll(tasks);
085      for (Future<Void> future : futures) {
086        try {
087          future.get();
088        } catch (ExecutionException ex) {
089          Throwable cause = ex.getCause();
090          if (cause instanceof Exception exception) {
091            throw exception;
092          }
093          throw new RuntimeException(cause);
094        }
095      }
096    } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
097      Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
098      log.warn("Poster pipelines interrupted; requesting shutdown");
099      executor.shutdownNow();
100      throw ex;
101    } finally {
102      executor.shutdown();
103      log.info("Poster worker pool shutdown initiated");
104    }
105  }
106
107  private void addTask(
108      List<Callable<Void>> tasks,
109      ProtocolId protocol,
110      Optional<ProtocolConfig> maybeConfig,
111      PosterConfig rootConfig) {
112    maybeConfig.ifPresent(cfg -> {
113      PosterPipeline pipeline = selectPipeline(protocol, cfg, rootConfig);
114      PosterOutputPort outputPort = selectOutputPort(protocol, cfg, rootConfig);
115      DecodeMode decodeMode = rootConfig.decodeMode();
116      tasks.add(() -> {
117        String previousProtocol = MDC.get("protocol");
118        Exception failure = null;
119        try {
120          MDC.put("protocol", protocol.name());
121          log.info("Poster {} pipeline started", protocol);
122          pipeline.process(cfg, decodeMode, outputPort);
123          log.info("Poster {} pipeline completed", protocol);
124        } catch (Exception ex) {
125          failure = ex;
126          log.error("Poster {} pipeline failed", protocol, ex);
127          throw ex;
128        } finally {
129          try {
130            outputPort.close();
131            log.info("Poster {} output closed", protocol);
132          } catch (Exception closeEx) {
133            if (failure != null) {
134              failure.addSuppressed(closeEx);
135              log.error("Poster {} output close failure (suppressed)", protocol, closeEx);
136            } else {
137              log.error("Poster {} output close failure", protocol, closeEx);
138              throw closeEx;
139            }
140          } finally {
141            if (previousProtocol == null) {
142              MDC.remove("protocol");
143            } else {
144              MDC.put("protocol", previousProtocol);
145            }
146          }
147        }
148        return null;
149      });
150    });
151  }
152
153  private PosterPipeline selectPipeline(
154      ProtocolId protocol,
155      ProtocolConfig config,
156      PosterConfig rootConfig) {
157    boolean kafkaInput = config.kafkaInputTopic().isPresent();
158    if (!kafkaInput) {
159      PosterPipeline pipeline = pipelines.get(protocol);
160      if (pipeline == null) {
161        throw new IllegalStateException("No poster pipeline registered for " + protocol);
162      }
163      return pipeline;
164    }
165
166    String bootstrap = rootConfig.kafkaBootstrap()
167        .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("kafkaBootstrap required for Kafka poster input"));
168    return switch (protocol) {
169      case HTTP -> new HttpKafkaPosterPipeline(bootstrap);
170      case TN3270 -> new Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline(bootstrap);
171      default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unsupported protocol: " + protocol);
172    };
173  }
174
175  private PosterOutputPort selectOutputPort(
176      ProtocolId protocol,
177      ProtocolConfig config,
178      PosterConfig rootConfig) {
179    IoMode mode = rootConfig.posterOutMode();
180    boolean kafkaInput = config.kafkaInputTopic().isPresent();
181
182    if (!kafkaInput) {
183      if (mode == IoMode.KAFKA) {
184        throw new IllegalArgumentException("posterOutMode=KAFKA requires Kafka input for " + protocol);
185      }
186      return new FilePosterOutputAdapter(
187          config.outputDirectory().orElseThrow(() ->
188              new IllegalArgumentException(protocol + " output directory required")),
189          protocol);
190    }
191
192    if (mode == IoMode.KAFKA) {
193      String bootstrap = rootConfig.kafkaBootstrap()
194          .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("kafkaBootstrap required for Kafka poster output"));
195      String topic = config.kafkaOutputTopic()
196          .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("Kafka report topic required for " + protocol));
197      return new KafkaPosterOutputAdapter(bootstrap, topic);
198    }
199
200    return new FilePosterOutputAdapter(
201        config.outputDirectory().orElseThrow(() ->
202            new IllegalArgumentException(protocol + " output directory required")),
203        protocol);
204  }
205
206  private static Map<ProtocolId, PosterPipeline> defaultPipelines() {
207    Map<ProtocolId, PosterPipeline> map = new EnumMap<>(ProtocolId.class);
208    map.put(ProtocolId.HTTP, new HttpPosterPipeline());
209    map.put(ProtocolId.TN3270, new Tn3270PosterPipeline());
210    return map;
211  }
212}
